PARAGRAPH.STRING: (b. April 18, 1964 in Glasgow, Scotland) is a widely published and controversial British historian of modern imperialism.
was educated as a Demy at Magdalen College, Oxford, graduating with a first class honours degree.
is the Laurence A. Tisch Professor of History at Harvard University, a Senior Research Fellow of Jesus College, Oxford University and a Senior Fellow of the Hoover Institution, Stanford University.
is a specialist in financial and economic history.
